subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4846, how did it go?
description_text: Hi guys, The VAM is not yet delivered. Once I get everything I will certainly write a review! Thanks, Stefano Sent from mobile On 5 Jan 2026, at 14:48, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote: ﻿ Hello Stefano, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
